pages.text: While commonly associated as pets, Boston Terriers were originally bred for fighting and getting rid of vermin.$(br2)Standing barely over a half block tall, these compact dogs come in two coats.
Boston Terriers are found most commonly in deserts and badlands. You can also find them in savannas and more rarely in wooded badlands.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
